one_reviews_text: My wife and I have put hours into this, even after beating it we continue even if just to mess around in the environment and look for more oragami birds. This is a well thought out escape room game and it is well worth the price. Experienced no bugs and has worked well on rift cv1 and rift s for me, on low end and high end gpus with good performance.
Unfortunately I bought this a month ago or though, so I can't refund it. This game only crashes even on low quality. I never got it to run

review_title: great game better than the first!
one_reviews_text: I love this game! it is so much better than the first one! great game!
thank you dev's it help alot finnaly finished the game but i still had trouble with the circuts but that's on me
review_feedback: Great to hear! All the best, the devs
